name: Alien 3: Assembly Cut
overview: The same game you’ve always loved, and maybe always wanted to love more. Maybe now you can with these new changes to this underrated gem: Known bug: sound effects can sporadically drop after several stages of continuous gameplay on consoles. (This bug is in the original version of the game.) Simply use a terminal to return the sound behavior to normal. • 1. New control scheme option, based on the controls of Super Metroid, tweaked for tight performance. If you like the original controls, they are retained as an option. See Readme for details. • 2. Save feature at terminals. Two per level, so save wisely! Press Select to save. • 3. New cheat codes!!
